svcBlueSub: Driven by experience. Defined by care. Measured by impact.
svcText: We are the CCE Tech Team, an agile digital team created through the nonprofit I Fly Young CCE. If you’re interested in partnering with us, feel free to fill out this short form!

svcContents.svcLText: We provide expert UX consultation and deliver comprehensive audits to help improve usability, accessibility, and user engagement.
svcContents.svcMText: We provide UX/UI consultation and tailored design using website and app builders like Wix or Webflow, delivering cost-effective, launch-ready solutions.
svcContents.svcRText: We deliver end-to-end UX/UI consultation, design, and fully customized web or mobile development to meet your specific business needs and technical requirements.

svcCapSub: we can also tailor our itemized service to your specific needs

svcCapCon.capText: We design and build responsive, user-friendly websites that align with your brand and drive business results.
We create intuitive, mobile-first app designs that prioritize user experience and functionality across platforms.
We develop cohesive brand systems—including logos, colors, and typography—that visually communicate your mission and values.
We evaluate your existing digital experience and provide actionable insights to improve usability, accessibility, and engagement.
We create tailored images and videos that go beyond standard AI generation, delivering content that’s customized, polished, and aligned with your brand.
Come talk to us! We’re here to advice the need that you’re looking for!

svcApprText1: Listening carefully to your business needs
scvMsnText1: We are a nonprofit workforce development program that bridges the gap between the growing digital needs of small businesses and the limited real-world opportunities for emerging professionals and those transitioning into the tech industry.
scvMsnText2:
1. To deliver professional, budget-friendly tech solutions to organizations. 
 2. And to provide hands-on experience for emerging talent transitioning into the tech industry.

contents.leftText: Reimagined and launched an end-to-end redesigned site in 6 months.
contents.midText: Improved site structure, usability, and mobile responsiveness
contents.rightText: Created a platform now used by 1,000+ of trainees and coaches

contents.notes: Estimated timeline may vary based on different project

svcBtmTexts:
Have something in mind?
 Let’s build something meaningful together by filling out a quick survey sheet via the button below. 
 One of our team members will respond back to you shortly! 

 Or you can reach us via email at: ccetech@iflyyoung.com
